SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.security

Class PasswordHashService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.security.PasswordHashService
public final class PasswordHashService extends Object
Service class providing password hashing functionality using Argon2id. This class implements secure password hashing with the following features: - Uses Argon2id algorithm for memory-hard password hashing - Provides resistance against brute-force and rainbow table attacks - Includes salt generation and verification - Configurable memory usage, iterations, and parallelism
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Method Details

    • hashPassword

      public static PasswordHashService.PasswordHashResult hashPassword(String password) throws PasswordHashService.PasswordHashException
      Hashes a password using Argon2id algorithm. This method: - Generates a cryptographically secure random salt - Applies the Argon2id hashing algorithm with configured parameters - Returns the hash result along with the salt and parameters
      Parameters:
      password - The password to be hashed
      Returns:
      A PasswordHashResult object containing the hash, salt, and parameters
      Throws:
      PasswordHashService.PasswordHashException - If an error occurs during the hashing process

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword(String password, String hash) throws PasswordHashService.PasswordHashException
      Verifies a password against a stored hash. This method: - Uses the Argon2id algorithm to verify the password - Compares the computed hash with the stored hash - Returns true if the password matches, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      password - The password to verify
      hash - The stored hash to verify against
      Returns:
      true if the password matches the hash, false otherwise
      Throws:
      PasswordHashService.PasswordHashException - If an error occurs during the verification process
